entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 12:28 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -12.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
